2026-02-02.content:
The Firestore databases page in the Google Cloud console now includes
a status column. Possible statuses include:

* Ready
* Cloning is in progress
* Restoring from backup is in progress
* Deleted
* Failed

For the cloning and restore statuses, the status column updates upon completion.

summary.title: New status column in Firestore
summary.summary: The Firestore databases page now displays a status column, showing states like Ready, Cloning in progress, Restoring from backup, Deleted, or Failed. This column updates in real-time for cloning and restore operations.

2025-11-21.content: Support for Object as document `_id` identifier.

summary.title: Object ID Support
summary.summary: You can now use objects as document identifiers. This feature enhances flexibility for unique document identification.
